column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Toph says : " Ahhh , that 's the stuff .
#Text=I do n't want you hunting the Avatar anymore !
#Text=The mission is off .
#Text=I 'm ordering you to stop .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If you keep attacking , I wo n't pay you !
#Text=All right , I 'll pay you double to stop !
#Text=" Toph says : " He 's going to blast this whole place right off the cliff side !
#Text=" Katara says : " I ca n't step out to waterbend at him without being blown up and I ca n't get a good enough angle on him from down here .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I know how to get an angle on him !
#Text=All right buddy , do n't fail me now !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , boomerang !
#Text=Awww , boomerang ... " Aang says : " I ca n't believe I 'm saying this , but ... thanks , Zuko .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , what about me ?
#Text=I did the boomerang thing .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Listen , I know I did n't explain myself very well yesterday , I 've been through a lot in the last few years , and it 's been hard .
#Text=But I 'm realizing that I had to go through all those things to learn the truth .
#Text=I thought I had lost my honor , and that somehow my father could return it to me .
#Text=But I know now that no one can give you your honor .
#Text=It 's something you earn for yourself , by choosing to do what 's right .
#Text=All I want to do now is play my part in ending this war , and I know my destiny is to help you restore balance to the world .
#Text=I 'm sorry for what I did to you .
#Text=It was an accident .
#Text=Fire can be dangerous and wild , so as a firebender , I need to be more careful and control my bending , so I do n't hurt people unintentionally .
#Text=" Aang says : " I think you are supposed to be my firebending teacher .
#Text=When I first tried to learn firebending , I burned Katara , and after that , I never wanted to firebend again .
#Text=But now I know you understand how easy it is to hurt the people you love .
#Text=I 'd like you to teach me .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Thank you .
#Text=I 'm so happy you 've accepted me into your group .
#Text=" Aang says : " Not so fast .
#Text=I still have to ask my friends if it 's okay with them .
#Text=Toph , you 're the one that Zuko burned .
#Text=What do you think ?
#Text=" Toph says : " Go ahead and let him join .
#Text=It 'll give me plenty of time to get back at him for burning my feet .
#Text=" Aang says : " Sokka ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , all I want is to defeat the Fire Lord .
#Text=If you think this is the way to do it , then , I 'm all for it .
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'll go along with whatever you think is right .
#Text=" Zuko says : " I wo n't let you down !
#Text=I promise !
#Text=" Sokka says : " So , here you go , home sweet home , I guess , you know , for now .
#Text=Unpack ?
#Text=Lunch , soon ?
#Text=Uhhh ... welcome aboard ?
#Text=Yeah .
#Text=Okay , this is really , really weird .
#Text=" Zuko says : " If I have to , I will spend every day of the rest of my life hunting the Avatar .
#Text=I know it 's my destiny to capture him .
#Text=" Iroh says : " You know Prince Zuko , destiny is a funny thing .
#Text=You never know how things are going to work out .
#Text=But if you keep an open mind , and an open heart , I promise you will find your own destiny someday .
#Text=" Katara says : " You might have everyone else here buying your ... transformation , but you and I both know you 've struggled with doing the right thing in the past .
#Text=So let me tell you something , right now .
#Text=You make one step backward , one slip - up , give me one reason to think you might hurt Aang , and you wo n't have to worry about your destiny anymore .
#Text=Because I 'll make sure your destiny ends ... right then and there .
#Text=Permanently .
#Text=" Main Aang Appa Katara Momo Sokka Toph Zuko Antagonists Combustion Man says : " Minor The Duke Haru Iroh ( flashback only ) Teo " Katara says : " I ca n't believe I lost him .
#Text="
